original_title: Election Commission to decide on LG Poll today (3)
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka's Election Commission will meet on Friday (3) to decide on the Local Government Election.
The 2023 Local Government Election was scheduled to take place on the 9th of March, however, it was postponed indefinitely due to various issues, including the lack of funding.
However, the Election Commission is expected to announce the next date of the Local Government Election following Friday's (3) meeting.
